title: Implement mobile navigation menu
body:
**Context**: Mobile menu button exists in navigation but has no functionality.

**Current State**:
- Mobile menu button visible on small screens (line 80-84 in base.html)
- Button doesn't trigger any menu
- Navigation links hidden on mobile

**Tasks**:
- [ ] Add JavaScript to toggle mobile menu visibility
- [ ] Create mobile menu dropdown/sidebar
- [ ] Ensure all nav links accessible on mobile
- [ ] Add smooth transitions
- [ ] Test on various mobile screen sizes

**Files**: `app/templates/base.html`, `app/static/js/app.js`

**Priority**: P2
**Effort**: 2 hours
**Epic**: UI
**Phase**: Polish

title: Implement or remove skim/detail view toggle on articles page
body:
**Context**: Articles page has view toggle buttons that don't do anything.

**Current State**:
- Toggle buttons for "Detailed" and "Skim" views exist
- No backend logic to switch views
- TODO comment in app.js line 38

**Decision Needed**:
Either:
1. **Implement the feature** (show compact vs full article cards)
2. **Remove the toggle** (articles page is now secondary)

**If Implementing**:
- [ ] Add CSS classes for skim view (compact cards)
- [ ] Wire up JavaScript to toggle classes
- [ ] Persist preference in localStorage
- [ ] Test both views

**If Removing**:
- [ ] Remove toggle buttons from index.html
- [ ] Remove TODO from app.js
- [ ] Simplify articles page layout

**Files**: `app/templates/index.html`, `app/static/js/app.js`, `app/static/css/custom.css`

**Priority**: P2
**Effort**: 1 hour (implement) or 15 min (remove)
**Epic**: UI
**Phase**: Polish

title: Add response time tracking to feed health monitoring
body:
**Context**: Feed management dashboard shows health metrics but doesn't track response times.

**Current State**:
- Health score based on success rate and failure tracking
- TODO comment in main.py line 459: `avg_response_time_ms=0.0`
- No timing data collected during feed fetches

**Tasks**:
- [ ] Add `response_time_ms` column to feeds table (migration)
- [ ] Measure fetch time in `fetch_and_store()`
- [ ] Calculate rolling average (last 10 fetches)
- [ ] Update health score calculation to include response time
- [ ] Display response time in feed management UI
- [ ] Add "slow feed" indicator (>5s response time)

**Files**: `app/db.py`, `app/feeds.py`, `app/main.py`, `app/templates/feed_management.html`

**Priority**: P2
**Effort**: 3 hours
**Epic**: Operations
**Milestone**: v0.6.0 or v0.7.0
